StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_ONEO.cerSelec.onBoardDetails]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN SELECT B.FRIENDLY_NAME ,P.LAST_NAME ,P.FIRST_NAME ,LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1) AS MI ,RIGHT(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, 4) AS LAST4 ,MC.GENDER_CODE AS GEN ,CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION ,OBS.DESCRIPTION ,CASE WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ')) THEN 'W' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') ) THEN 'AA' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 'H' ELSE 'O' END AS ETH ,R.RACE_DESC ,E.ETHNIC_SHRT_DESCRIPTION ,MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_DESC ,MEC.ETHNIC_CATEGORY_DESC ,REC.LAST_NAME AS OSO ,PG.RANK_CODE AS PR_SVC ,OAI.CONTRACT_GPA as CURRENT_GPA ,OAI.LAST_PFT_SCORE ,CA.AFQT_SCORE ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ASVAB_SCORE ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_SAT_SCORE ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ACT_SCORE ,'AQR:' + CAST(OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ASTB_AQR_SCORE AS CHAR(1)) + ',FORAR:' + CAST(OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ASTB_FORAR_SCORE AS CHAR(1)) + ',PFAR:' + CAST(OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ASTB_PFAR_SCORE AS CHAR(1)) AS 'ASTB'FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN OFFICER_BOARD_STATUS OBS ON OBS.BOARD_STATUS_ID = OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS_OLAP..OFFICER_APPLICANT_INTEGRATED OAI ON N.NWA_ID = OAI.APPLICANT_ID INNER JOIN PERSON REC ON N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = REC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MARINE M ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY_GRADE PG ON PG.PAY_GRADE_CODE = M.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ETHNIC E ON MC.ETHNIC_CODE = E.ETHNIC_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN RACE R ON MC.RACE_CODE = R.RACE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CATEGORY MEC ON MC.MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CODE = MEC.ETHNIC_CATEGORY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MEPCOM_RACE_CATEGORY MRC ON MC.MEPCOM_RACE_CODE = MRC.RACE_CATEGORY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(CA2.ASVAB_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA2 WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1
END
